page.title: 06HARMBY AREA-LIFESTYLES
page.content: THERE ARE TWO VILLAGES IN THIS AREA, HARMBY AND SPENNITHORNE.THE HOUSES ARE A MIXTURE OF OLD AND NEW.HARMBY IS THE BIGGER VILLAGE WITH A LARGE ESTATE OF MODERN BUNGALOWS.THERE ARE POST-WAR COUNCIL HOUSES IN BOTH VILLAGES. NEARLY EVERYBODY HAS A CAR.MOST PEOPLE HAVE MODERN ELECTRICAL HOME APPLIANCES SUCH AS TELEVISIONS, DISHWASHERS, AUTOMATIC WASHING MACHINES AND VIDEOS.FRIDGES AND FREEZERS ARE ALMOST ESSENTIAL BECAUSE OF THE LACK OF SHOPS.PEOPLE ON THE WHOLE LIVE VERY COMFORTABLY.MANY OF THE POPULATION ARE PROFESSIONAL PEOPLE AND RETIRED PEOPLE.EVERYONE SEEMS TO BE FINANCALLY SECURE JUDGING FROM THE NEAT APPEARANCE OF THE HOUSES.PEOPLE COME FROM A WIDE RANGE OF BACKGROUNDS, FROM WORKING CLASS TO LANDOWNERS WHO STILL HAVE A LOT OF INFLUENCE.
